pkgmetadata.longdescription: Genotypic Variance Components // Functionalities to compute model based genetic components i.e. genotypic variance, phenotypic variance and heritability for given traits of different genotypes from replicated data using methodology explained by Burton, G. W. Devane, E. H. (1953) (doi:10.2134/agronj1953.00021962004500100005x) and Allard, R.W. (2010, ISBN:8126524154).
